    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Canvas
    Singleton Canvas class responsible for managing and displaying graphical shapes.
    Color
    Represents a simple RGB color definition used for graphical shapes.
    Color
    A simple representation of an RGB color for pictures.
    Colorable
    Methods for modifying a shape color The color of the shape is used when drawing or filling
    Ellipse
    Represents an ellipse shape that can be drawn, filled, moved, and resized.
    Fillable
    Methods for filling a shape
    Keyboard
    Instantiate a Keyboard for obtaining key handling capability
    KeyboardEvent
    Keyboard events containing key codes and event types
    KeyboardEventType
    The type of events supported by the Keyboard
    KeyboardHandler
    Interface to be implemented by all classes that wish to receive keyboard events
    Line
    Represents a straight line defined by two endpoints.
    Mouse
    Instantiate a Mouse for obtaining mouse handling capability
    MouseEvent
    Mouse event containing x and y coordinates and the mouse event type
    MouseEventType
     
    MouseHandler
    Interface to be implemented by all classes that want to receive mouse events
    Movable
    Methods for moving a shape
    Picture
    A picture from an image file.
    Rectangle
    The Rectangle class represents a drawable and optionally filled rectangle that can be displayed on a canvas.
    Shape
    A shape that can be drawn on a canvas.
    Text
    The Text class represents a drawable text label that can be displayed on a canvas.
